title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Nov 20 2021
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Nov 20 2021
description:
Senator Rand Paul joins the show to discuss Fauci and why government overreach should concern everyone, regardless of party. Biden's inflation is going to hurt all Americans. Times Square New Year’s Eve is back: unvaccinated not invited. What would have happened to Fauci if Trump had won the election? Covid is all the Democrats have to campaign on. Clay and Buck weigh in on their favorite Tom Clancy movies. TV show recommendations. Did George Washington have an English accent?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
